amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the language of H.R. 3053 and insert language establishing a consent-based siting process for determining a permanent nuclear waste repository.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-665 to strike the language of H.R. 3053 and insert language establishing a consent-based siting process for determining a permanent nuclear waste repository.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 332 (Roll no. 178).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Titus.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 332 (Roll no. 178).
